projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Developed a dynamic website leveraging the OpenWeatherMap API to provide real-time weather data for user-specified locations. The site is designed to retrieve and display temperature, humidity, and wind speed information.

projects.name: Text-Summarizer
projects.description: Developed a Text Summarizer application that efficiently extracts the main points from large volumes of text, providing concise summaries to save users time.

projects.name: Online Book Store
projects.description: Developed a dynamic Online Book Store using ASP.NET MVC framework, integrating user registration, book catalog management, shopping cart, secure checkout, order processing, payment gateway integration, and admin panel for inventory and order management. Utilized technologies including ASP.NET MVC, Entity Framework, SQL Server, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and Payment Gateway API. Enhanced user experience, improved inventory management, facilitated secure transactions, and generated business insights.

experiences.description: Developed an scalable, dynamic, and efficient web application about a Book Store using Asp.Net. Optained experience and expertise in Analysis, Design, Development and Testing of computer software application systems.

Developed an scalable, dynamic, and efficient web application about a Food Shopping using Asp.Net. Optained experience and expertise in Analysis, Design, Development and Testing of computer software application systems.

Developed a Text Summarizer application that efficiently extracts the main points from large volumes of text using python, providing concise summaries to save users time. Achieved high relevance and coherence in summaries through machine learning techniques.
